name: HioshiruArtStyle
description:
There're two versions of Hioshiru's artstyle Lora model. One is trained on FurryVixen base model, another is on Lucid's Mix. You can find both base model on Civitai.

I trained it on 301 images I downloaded from e621 and tagged it with wd-tagger.

Tips: you can use it together with other characters' Lora and it works well. No trigger words are needed. Hope you enjoy it.

Some images examples are not Upscaled.

It is recommoned that you use anything's VAE or some other VAE if you want to get high saturation results.

After I install Locon Support extension in WebUI, the result seems to get very bad. I don't know the reason. Weird. I don't recommond to install that Support. If it reports 'Failed to match keys when loading Lora', just ignore it.
